species.name: beheeyem
descriptions: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.
It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
It has strong psychic powers. Using its fingers that flash three different colors, it controls its opponents and rewrites their memories.
It uses psychic power to control an opponent’s brain and tamper with its memories.
Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields, this Pokémon can control the memories of its opponents.

abilities.name: telepathy
abilities.effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
